messages.title: Beating the
messages.content: Families across our area have been clear we need action now to help local people's pockets. They plan to make the first £10,000 you earn tax free. This will give everyone a tax cut and take millions of low paid workers out of tax.

messages.title: Investing in our future
messages.content: As a parent and chair of governors at local secondary schools, Claire understands the future success of our area. She started campaigns to support local schools and pre-schools. Claire also wants to make sure our area has a chance to get started in life. She campaigned against tuition and top-up fees as a student and top-up fees.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make the first £10,000 you earn tax free, resulting in a tax cut for everyone and taking millions of low paid workers out of tax.
Support local schools and pre-schools; ensure the area's youth has a chance to get started in life; opposed tuition and top-up fees.

issues.economy: Tax cuts for low paid workers.
issues.education: Support local schools, oppose tuition and top-up fees.
issues.socialWelfare: Tax cut for everyone by making the first £10,000 earned tax free.

leaflet.personalStatement: I could not have a better successor than Claire Kelley. I know that she will be a true champion for local people, a tireless campaigner on the issues that matter to the people of Harrogate, Knaresborough and Boroughbridge' - Phil Willis MP

politicalExperience.role: Chair of Governors at local secondary schools
politicalExperience.achievements: Started campaigns to support local schools and pre-schools.

endorsements.endorsement: I could not have a better successor than Claire Kelley. I know that she will be a true champion for local people, a tireless campaigner on the issues that matter to the people of Harrogate, Knaresborough and Boroughbridge.

images.caption: Claire Kelley and Phil Willis MP smiling outdoors.
